segments.text: I notice the boy is about to take all the cookies, and the girl is just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s being so greedy, and she’s not even trying to stop him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip, and he’s going to fall right into that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s being selfish, and the girl is just letting him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless they’re all being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to get hurt, and it’s his own fault.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl should know better than to encourage him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just messy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t break anything when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
